website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Cosmic 2.0 SL, just like the popular Adidas Ultraboost 19 is a neutral road running shoe which was found to be comfortable, lightweight, and breathable. Plenty of users used it for daily activities, as well as work, without experiencing any pain. Some exceptions were saying that the shoe needed to be broken in. Despite this, many still agreed that the second version of the Cosmic SL was an affordable choice for a versatile trainer fit for daily use.
pros: Almost all testers commented on how comfortable the shoe was
Most used it for daily activities that required standing for a long time
They reported that their feet did not hurt at all
Plenty of runners said that the construction felt substantial
The overall design was described as stylish and clean by a lot of users
Many runners commended the breathability of the upper
A lot of users were pleased that the weight felt light
A majority of testers mentioned that they felt supported during their runs
A great number of consumers were surprised that the price was reasonable
cons: One runner got an ankle cut after wearing her pair for the first time
Another user experienced stone bruising, while others had blisters
The Adidas Cosmic 2.0 SL required breaking in based on some reviews
One user mentioned that the outsole made a squeaking sound on hardwood floors which was bothersome
Another tester observed that the rubber on the outsole was coming off after four weeks of gym usage

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were very comfortable and I liked wearing them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for new gym shoes. After 4weeks of wearing them at the gym ONLY the rubber is coming off the sole. Shoes were very comfortable and I liked wearing them, but I'm really disappointed with the quality. You can see from my photos the shoes are barely. SMH com'on Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe but runs samll for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is great and would have received 5 stars except for the fit problem. I wear an 11.5 and almost always have a good fit when ordering that size. These shoes feel tight and I had to return them. Naturally Amazon makes that easy, especially with the Kohl's Department Store return option. I plan to order the same shoe again as a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: May snag your toenail painfully after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly after less than 90 days and about 250 miles the right shoe has developed a hole where my toe has rubbed. The shoes were alway sort of unbending but reasonably comfortable. I might have kept them longer but my nail has begun to snag painfully on the fabric. My own fault, another reviewer complained about the same thing. I went back to my well worn Nike Free 5s and realized what is wrong with Adidas. They are so inflexible that your foot can’t naturally lift at the toes. Actually the box they came in would be as comfortable as the Adidas. I’ve ordered a new pair of Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: John Swift

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, cool, and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear for casual dress and not actually for running. Unlike many running shoes these don't particularly look like running shoes and due to their mesh construction they are light weight, cool, and comfortable. They also look great with shorts, jeans, etc.
customer_reviews.author: busrey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. This is the second pair I owned
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. This is the second pair I owned . I normally wear size 11 but on his shoe 11.5 fits better.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are Awesome; so far!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how awesome these shoes are! I really don't like running shoes, especially ones like these. But I took a chance and I'm so glad I did. They re light, fit pretty good (except if they're worn loose they feel like they may come off but that could be because I'm not use to shoes like these in type and specifically) and they look great. I never want to take them off. I gave this product four stars because I haven't had then for long so I don't know how they would handle wear and tear or I would have given them five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They're light and they feel like I'm walking on a cushion of air. They're what the Nike Air used to be, way back in the day before they raised their prices and expressed their hatred of law enforcement officers. Actually, they're better, as they're much lighter and better ventilated. Back to the Adidas, they're easy on my ankles and knees, and a joy to wear. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: The look good but don't feel good
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on in the store and bought on Amazon because the color I wanted was not in stock locally. They look good and initially they seem really soft and comfortable so I put them into my sneaker rotation. Unfortunately after wearing for about a dozen full days I just don't like them. They are breaking in strange and feeling a bit lumpy around the heel. My feet also get really hot and they don't seem to breathe at all. The size 12 is to be expected for Adidas, Nike, Saucony. Ignore the reviews telling you go go bigger or smaller just get your regular size in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: zd

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars up until about 5 minutes ago when the size label came off of the tongue of the shoe into my hand while putting the shoes on. Fluke, maybe, I will take my history of bad luck into consideration lol. These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned(as of 4 hours on my feet). I drive a manual transmission car and I have had to retrain my feet to drive because I can not feel the pedal, that's how comfortable they are. I will follow up in a couple of months and see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Allison

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. They are lightweight and very well cushioned. I am on my feet many hours of the day. My feet would be hurting by the end of the day in my old shoes. These shoes have stopped my feet hurting at the end of the day. I have gone from owning 0 Adidas Cloudfoam shoes 18 months ago, to owning 10 different Adidas Cloudfoam shoes today. I highly recommend them. I have several different colors and styles now.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonWB

customer_reviews.title: very comfortables ones, a very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: ok, it seems to me that something wrong happen with this shoes, because there look something different for the ones in the videos and reviews at youtube (could they be fake ones?). But after a visit to the adidas website in the US, I saw the model and realize they has changed the design, that may due possibly to adjustments in the lots of manufacture of the product. now, about the feeling, they are comfortables, and now I am using they everyday. I am very pleased with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Supuy Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good and great cushioning but ran very small. I always wear a 10 and these fit like 9.5. Sent back..
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Asensio

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable straight out of the box, there nice I use them for work and I walk up and down stairs for 8 to 9 hour shifts and I'm constantly moxing they help my feet not hurt I highly recommend mainly for price and comfort I'd like to by another pair for just casual.
customer_reviews.author: Blake R.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I run quite a bit due to my occupation. I've dealt with everything from shin, ankle, knee and hip pain. Most of my running is divided between anaerobic and aerobic (interval sprints to 6mile runs and everything in between). These shoes are extremely comfortable. They fit well enough to be doing agility drills and are soft enough for a 6 mile run without ankle or foot pain (I have bone spurs in one foot). I'm debating over ordering one more pair or two!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT make you the Green Arrow -- But will get you close.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes that were wonderfully comfortable the moment I put them on. No real break-in period either -- ended up playing "Archery Tag" the first day these puppies arrived so I thought, "Why not?" Let me tell you, there is probably no causal relationship between these shoes and getting headshots, but I'll be damned if the correlation isn't STRONG. Comfy, look great, and keep your feet cool even as you're sprinting around for a few hours pretending you're Hawkeye or Green Arrow. Definitely a good purchase and a bargain for the price you can get it here!
customer_reviews.author: Micah W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Just beware that the fabric isn't water resistant. Anything liquid hits the shoe and your socks and feet are wet. This is strictly a dry weather shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sneaker, this particular model. I have these maroon ones as well as the gray ones. But I like the maroon version much better as it just looks beautiful, stands out in my hospital scrubs, and more importantly, FEELS GREAT. Durability is good for walking all day everywhere, or when I wear them out for leisure. Adidas are my top brand and I'm certain I'll order a few more of these over time, as supply allows.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but sizing is a little big.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice and comfortable. Look good. Sizing is a little big. Toe box is really roomy for the size. I had to add another thin sole insert to get the fit better. Adidas is my favorite brand because I like their low key logos and style. However, they do need to get their shoe sizing consistent. I buy a lot of Adidas shoes and they all fit differently. Nike on the other hand, fit pretty consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Crash Test Dummy

customer_reviews.title: Cloud comfort from Adidas
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually make reviews on my Amazon purchases, but this one is an exception. These Adidas shoes are one of the most comfortable that I have owned. The name speaks for itself as Cloud Foam. And by the way, I first bought these at DSW for $69.95 but after some research in Amazon I had a good bargain at $47.98. Of course. I returned those in DWS and bought 2 pairs from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Juan dela Cruz, atbp

customer_reviews.title: Loose Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for awhile now and decided to write a review. First, the shoes are really good looking in my opinion, and go well with jeans or shorts. Secondly, the length of the shoes run a tad larger than usual for Adidas, but not too much. However, the fit of the shoe is much wider than I expected, especially the toe box area. The width is a D size, but fit as if they were EE! Having said that, I do wear them with thicker socks and have simply accepted the shoes for what they are...Nice looking, but could be better fitting in the toes area.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. On Time

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving it a four star is because they feel a little loose even though they are not. I think that might be the price you have to pay for comfortable shoes. They are pretty comfortable though, the loose fit is only felt when you are running though. They are great for normal use and walking around all day. This is my second purchase of the same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Usama

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fashionable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 14 and these were just barely long enough. I have worn them multiple times however and they have been comfortable. They even accommodate my plantar fasciitis heel insert. I wouldn't run in them however due to the fit. They were a great buy on sale for about $28. I would be happy with them at triple the price. I will wear them frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Kent and Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Not real adidas. Knockoffs (all-black color ones)
customer_reviews.text: KNOCKOFFS.....don’t match the shoes in the picture. The all-black versions I received are not authentic. Different tongue label and insole printing. Practically rock-hard soles compared to my store-bought Cosmics.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: With these shoes Adidas shows why they are the best, The look, quality and comfort are top notch with these shoes. I attend a lot of concerts and am standing on my feet for 7-10 hours at a time in one spot and these are the best shoes for that. Adidas does it again with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: It’a a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Never have I ever purchased the same shoe twice until this design. They are probably the lightest, most breathable, and all around most comfortable shoe that I’ve ever purchased. I stand half a day at work. I had a pair of allbirds and they do not compare. Thank you Adidas, for this relatively demure, not overly busy looking, affordable, comfortable shoe that’s easy to wash and easy to wear. I’m looking forward to the next color combo after I break in this second pair.
customer_reviews.author: JTran14

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got two other pair of these shoes. They’re very durable and have held up a long time. I have flat feet and when I find a pair of shoes that feel good and work for me I usually buy them again if they’re available. I’m happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. When I first put them on I didn't think I was going to like them because it felt like there were some hard bulges on the bottom. It was odd. However, after a few minutes they softened up and they feel great. I ordered a half size bigger like every one said in the comments and they fit nice.
customer_reviews.author: MUHerd37

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes so I could go to the gym. I have never bought sneakers like this, EVER! Really not my style. But I needed a comfortable shoe to run n work out, in. Well... I chose the right one. So easy to wear, and they look and feel great too! 10 outta 10 would recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cisco A.

customer_reviews.title: Will Repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: With a teenage son, I buy a LOT of shoes. This pair of Adidas ROCK. I will be buying another pair when he wears these out or outgrows them. Comfort, fashion, fit, durability - all A+. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: ThriftandKnack

customer_reviews.title: I’m going to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I never write reviews and I never buy shoes online. My foot is a bit wide, arch is moderate. These fit perfect. Often athletic shoes are more narrow. I don’t run in them, but wear them to the gym and for casual dress. They look good in jeans.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: At this point, I have bought these shoes in every color. For the price, how could I not stock up on good looking shoes that feel like walking on clouds!!!
customer_reviews.author: OlyDawg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I hate shoe shopping because I tend to have a hard time finding my size. These were on sale and I figured I would give them a try. They came in my size and they fit perfectly! They're stylish and comfortable! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't LOOK or FEEL as GOOD as Online
customer_reviews.text: Too big - someone emphasized to buy half size larger than normal shoe size - WRONG. I got half size larger and they were half size too large - go figure. Plus it seems Addidas is trying hard for these to be $100 shoes - but obviously not making it. They are a good deal at max $60. Definitely on the stiff side. Back they go.
customer_reviews.author: Mark needs VALUE

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I went with these because I liked the way they looked. The outer material is lightweight and breathable so your feet won’t sweat and the cushion is a memory foam which is super soft. I enjoy wearing these as I haven’t had soreness from being in my feet for an extended amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyWu

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best shoes I have ever owned. I would highly recommend these, for the built in comfort alone is worth it. I am on my second set of these, I wore the others everyday for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Go one size up!  good for runing and gym
customer_reviews.text: Using one month for running and i'm glad with quality and cushioning. in adidas originals i'm using 8.5 size but for this shoe i advice to go one size up, about 9.5. i have ordered 9 size and it's good on light socks but small on thick running socks. update: i have ordered second pair, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rezo

customer_reviews.title: Good service and loved that I was able to order ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected. Good service and loved that I was able to order with prime wardrobe. The shoe was not a look I was expecting but since I got them with wardrobe i was able to return easily. the look of the she is not an issue with the store so my experience with them was great.
customer_reviews.author: Homero Martinez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this same shoe over 5 times and it is a perfect fit for my foot. Wish I could find more pairs but i get them when i can. Big boy approved, great for runs, handles the rain well.
customer_reviews.author: bozbozboz

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes not only have a great look to them but are some of the most comfortable walking shoes I've ever had. I used these shoes almost daily to walk my dogs multiple miles a day and these shoes are super comfortable. The shoes provide plenty of support, have a great fit and look great.
customer_reviews.author: dREW

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe, runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Great aesthetic to the shoe. My size varies between a 12 and 13, depending on the brand. I have worn a 12.5 in Adidas before, but this model was just too small. Probably would have worked if I had gone with a 13, but was out of stock at the time. If you get the right size, this looks to be a solid casual shoe that looks great. Just be prepared to order at least a 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Username Hidden

customer_reviews.title: A good substitute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because i am wearing out my Adidas Cloudfoam Race shoes and the Cosmic was the closest shoe to the Race that I could find. I like the fact that the shoe has Cloudfoam, which is incredibly comfortable. I don’t care for the mesh top because I think it is prone to damage pretty easily. However, the shoe is inexpensive. It is a good buy for the money. This shoe is marketed as a running shoe but I use it for walking.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Did not know what to expect until I tried these shoes on. They fit perfect, no break in time needed. Out of the box and on my feet, no blisters of new shoe break in. Very comfortable to the point you forget they are on, I think I will be getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at the best price.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable foam shoes and lightweight I take them biking, running, and hiking all the time. They have good bottom tread for foam shoes. They're really reliable and comfortable. They are not narrow which is good and not too wide, however I believe someone with a wide foot will definitely enjoy these. I'm looking for another pair of Adidas to switch it up a bit and see what other good running shoes they have at this great price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Husband has multiple pairs of these
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. He wears them to work almost everyday. He has them in multiple colors, and when they are getting old looking, we order a new pair. Hope they don't discontinue this style
customer_reviews.author: sandradia

customer_reviews.title: The cloudfoam insoles are super comfortable and form fitting
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are as described. Very clean, sophisticated, light weight shoe. Well made with quality materials. The cloudfoam insoles are super comfortable and form fitting. Great support on the arch and the heel of the foot without compromising the over all structure of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: StephenBrooks02

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our son who needed some new sneakers. They were very reasonably priced for a pair of Adidas shoes. My son says they fit well and they are comfortable. They are a nice color blue. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying these!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly! The quality is very nice and the cloudfoam is heavenly. It is, hands down, the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I have always bought Reebok shoes, but Adidas has won me over with these!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Gann

customer_reviews.title: i dont like that material it is made of
customer_reviews.text: i dont like that material it is made of. its almost like cloth, the form doesnt stay. also there was glue marks all over the bottom where it attaches the rubber bottom. had to return, ive had similar problems with adidas from amazon
customer_reviews.author: john weiskopf

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit great
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Adidas since switching from other company. All have fit great. I walk 11,000 steps a day, about 8,000 of those while wearing the Adidas. Love the fit and love the look.
customer_reviews.author: MSpo57

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes my second pair. Fit great I wear a 14 and has great support for my low arch. Soft cushion and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: E. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Adidas always the same
customer_reviews.text: Adidas always fit the same and these are no different. Although, these are by far and away the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. I have three pair of them.
customer_reviews.author: ffudddtoo

customer_reviews.title: Solid comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great color and fit. I primary only buy Adidas because I’ve always had comfortable products. Hoping these hold up as long as some of my other pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: really comfortable with good support and bottom. we picked the gold/tan to have a neutral shoe for khakis. overall like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes in the world.ADIDAS FOR LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes may be the most comfortable i've ever had. There is no break-in period. The fabric mesh is instantly comfortable from the moment you put the shoe on.
customer_reviews.author: FUEL THE BERN

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and was bought a pair as a gift. The shoe is very comfortable and firs my foot perfectly, despite not being a “wide” size. I purchased this pair and another color
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: NOT a running shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible running shoes. They have hard soles like cross trainers and the 1/8 inch cloud foam is NOT like walking on a cloud. I don't even know it's in the shoe. I have only had these shoes 2 weeks and I had to buy insoles the 1st time I wore them. I do not recommend this shoe for anyone unless you like achy feet, knees and hips!
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This was my second pair. First pair lasted about 1 year of running and working out and heavy use. Comfortable and light!
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. It's very light and a lot of room for those with wide feet. I don't use for running, but for walking and casual use, its great!
customer_reviews.author: manibusj

customer_reviews.title: Great show for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great and have great support. They are very comfortable now but feel like they are breaking down quickly. Still a very good shot at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Like the look, fits ok but not same support as Boost that am wearing. Seems like you get what you pay for, these are not as beefy as other adidas runners seems like a good shoe for every day wear
customer_reviews.author: Lab

customer_reviews.title: poor design ,cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: I"ve walked Adidas shoes for years : this is the worst one ....sole is only decent part ,top is cheaply built and the rest is quite poor... overall it is mediocre ..regret buying
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Either these are bad shoes, or I got a defective pair, used 2 weeks one of the shoes is now crooked to one side so when I step my foot caves inwards, has caused ankle pain, I only weigh 180lbs. They have completely stretched out to the point where the laces are now dragging due to having to tie them tight. One shoe is bigger than the other...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoes and great price. Liked the first pair so much I got on amazon and bought this pair
customer_reviews.author: christopher bower

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and extremely comfortable shoe. I normally wear a 12 but got the 12 1/2 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: djbrian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & stylish
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look and feel comfortable. Has enough room for people with wide feet. They do run slightly large but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Piazza

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable....for my son...he loved them so much, he got a second pair. No break-in period needed, were just perfect the first time wearing them and the fit was fine, ordered his normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H

customer_reviews.title: Light but durable.
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing for a bout 4 1/2 months now, Apr. 2020-Aug 2020. Have held up to walking/jogging on hot asphalt and yard work. No cuts or tears and tread still has lots of life. Very light and keep feet cool. Have always loved the quality of Adidas products.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Two things that stand out for me on this shoe are 1) The look and style. These are very versatile with jeans, shorts, or dockers if need be. 2) they have to be the MOST comfortable shoe I have had. The cushioned sole with the padded insole makes me feel good by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not Gray Breathable Fabric, but Black & White Weave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because it looked like gray textured material. Instead, it's truly a black & white weave and contrasts a lot more with the gray accents than this photo portrays. I will be sending them back because they don't match my gray work pants. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small, particularly narrow
customer_reviews.text: The first impression after trying the shoes today is they are small and narrow, although "M" is marked after the shoes size. They can cause discomfort if wearing for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S-N-D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 4 months then flat
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes the first 4 months Of daily wear. Then the memory foam lost its cushion. Now they hurt my feet because they provide no support. $64 way too much for 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: There are better budget shoes out there.
customer_reviews.text: But this pair was tolerable for comfortability. Unfortunately for me, this pair only lasted around half a year until I noticed rips & rubber wear.
customer_reviews.author: Minsanitee

customer_reviews.title: Best Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these shoes. They are probably the most comfortable shoes I have ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the soft cushion foam and durable insoles for this price and lots of color combos. Caution, mesh shell shoes protect the little piggies as well as a Hay House
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robot

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Needed shoes to wear with nurse uniform which is navy blue.very comfortable working on my feet 12 hour shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene C. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair before and really liked them. Nice to find them here because I believe they are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas H.

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got a great pair shoes for a good price. Try and get a pair and see for your self
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just actually put these on today and got to say they are comftorbal not bad at all and look great alot of people like these.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love Adidas running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love Adidas running shoes. I've tried lots of running shoes, and Adidas are the only ones that never give me any blisters on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: LMNOP

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Sized perfectly for 9, good cushioning for walking, wouldn't rec for working out.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable shoe it's almost like wearing comfy slippers but actually shoes. They fit perfect and slide on nice and smooth. They showed up within days of my order. I would order again no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off Adidas
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not authentic Adidas, I've ordered several pairs of these over the years and never had a problem with the fit. However, when ordered from this Amazon seller, the shoes are enormous on me and not true to the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this style of adidas. He currently owns 4 pairs. They are his everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Wider then expected and heal doesn't fell secure.
customer_reviews.text: I know these are wide shoes but my feet are floating around in them. Heal also doesn't feel secure, slips around. They look nice but I will have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam E.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Adidas running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Adidas! Love the styling, fit to size, and cushioning sole. Price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Man from Kent

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ADIDAS and these are like running slippers
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously comfortable, attractive, sporty shoes. I'm not a runner but HIGHLY recommend these shoes to anyone seeking quality and comfort for excessive walking.
customer_reviews.author: william wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Kicks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I have been a Nike fan for many years..BUT..this shoe has converted me. I now own a black pair and a grey pair.
customer_reviews.author: Scotsman83

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have learned that Adidas are the way to go for all day comfort especially if you are putting in long hours on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan bilbao

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Doesn’t squeeze my toes like some do. The cloth shell is super comfortable. Bought two I different colors. Love them both. I was SUPPOSED to wear them only to the gym but now I wear them out with my jeans or chinos.
customer_reviews.author: TheFrequentBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect in my normal size. Shoes are extremely comfortable and weigh nearly nothing, almost as if going barefoot. Lots of support and they breathe like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: WCG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Adidas. Pleased with both. Guess New Balance has lost a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fun of Adidas and many thanks to Amazon for a pair of very comfortable, nice and brilliant quality shoes. I'd recommend everybody to own them. Really great shoes especially when you pay only $24.47 for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair in 2 years!! Will keep buying!!
customer_reviews.text: I also own these in black, but these are my 2nd pair in grey - most comfortable show I have owned in the past 15 - 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of these shoes and will buy again in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel amazing for the price. I have been walking on them for a month and still love them.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit apprehensive about buying shoes on the internet. This now makes the second pair of Adidas I've purchased through Amazon, and I couldn't be happier! There shoes are the most comfortable I have ever had! Will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. My 15 year old son finds these to be very comfortable and is quite happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Size and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model shoe a year ago. They were worn out and needed a new pair. I liked them so much, I searched on-line to find the exact same pair.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lohnes

customer_reviews.title: The cloud foam is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The cloud foam is what sold me on these. These are my second pair; same color and all. The las pair lasted a lot of miles, and are now my rain running shoes. Best running shoe I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Martin R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of these and they were knockoffs. I have a pair I bought from Adidas and the sneakers sent to me are clearly not the same as my original pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Bianchi

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Cosmic 2 Sl M Running Shoe
product_meta.description: With responsive cushioning and a deep midsole, this running shoe feels close to the skin.
feature_bullets: Seamless mesh exterior with marble-like appearance; comfortable neck
Enjoy the comfort and performance of the ortholite insole
Cloudfoam midsole for comfort and cushioning
Fitcounter molded heel reinforcement that provides a natural fit and allows optimal movements of the achilles heel
The adiwear sole provides the ultimate in durability and strength
